Panduan Lengkap Anda untuk Menjelajahi K: Your Complete Guide to Exploring the Wonders of Pacitan
misi_kami_p1: Pacitan Explorer was born from our love for the natural and cultural beauty of Pacitan Regency. Our mission is to make it easier for tourists, both local and international, to discover and explore every corner of the wonders offered by the \"City of 1001 Caves\".
misi_kami_p2: We believe that with technology, information about tourist destinations can be accessed more easily and interactively. Through this application, we hope to help promote Pacitan tourism and provide the best experience for travelers.
fitur_1: Interactive Map: Visualize locations and plan your trip.
fitur_2: Smart Route Planner: Get the best route recommendations with AI assistance.
fitur_3: Complete Information: From ticket prices, opening hours, to facilities, it's all here.
fitur_4: Save Favorites: Bookmark your dream places and access them quickly.
kontak_p1: Have questions, feedback, or want to collaborate? Feel free to contact us via email at
kontak_p2: This application is an open-source project built with Firebase and Next.js.
